attributes.action: Re-connect Ritchie Blackmore's guitar to the National Grid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Knowing the P.M's affection for rock music, and as a former member of Ugly Rumours we Deep Purple fans feel the Prime Minister should take immediate action to encourage Mr R. Blackmore to play his electric guitar in the prescribed manner and to refrain from Mandolin acoustic styles.

He is presently boring us to death with "Greenselves".

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
